name: B6Z Archive
summary: Learn about .B6Z files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: B6Zip is free software distributed under the GPL v2 license. The utility supports a large variety of compression methods, such as LZMA, LZMA2, Deflate, BZip2, and PPMD.

The B6Z format uses the LZMA2 compression method by default. Some of the features of the B6Z format include open architecture, high compression ratio, metadata compression, and state of the art AES-256 encryption.

instructions: You can try WinRAR and 7-Zip to open or extract B6ZIP files.Choose a destination folder for the extracted files, then start the extraction process.
